_metadata.root_name: AS GCM Clause Usage Report - Generate

entry_point.target_process: AS GCM Generate Clause Usage Report

process_model.name: AS GCM Generate Clause Usage Report

objects.name: AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM_LARGE
objects.description: 25 - MEDIUM_LARGE page size, used for grids and other paging situations

objects.name: AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_SMALL
objects.description: 5 - SMALL page size, used for grids and other paging situations

objects.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET
objects.description: DATA_SUBSET - Returns a type of DataSubset when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

objects.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
objects.description: OBJECT_ARRAY - Returns an array type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

objects.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_TOTAL_COUNT
objects.description: TOTAL_COUNT - Returns an Integer when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

objects.name: AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_SUBMIT
objects.description: SUBMIT.USER_ACTION - Value to use to drive process logic after a user performs a "Submit" action
called_by: AS GCM Generate Clause Usage Report

objects.name: AS_GCM_BOL_RECORD_ACTION_SECURITY_ON_DEMAND_TOGGLE
objects.description:
Value: True 
Update the value to false if you don't want the menu icons to load to evaluate security when clicked. When set to True the Icon loads and then shows the available actions.

objects.name: AS_GCM_CLAUSE_TITLE_ALTERNATE
objects.description: Clause Title: Alternate

objects.name: AS_GCM_CLAUSE_TITLE_DEVIATION
objects.description: Clause Title: DEVIATION

objects.name: AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE
objects.description: Batch size: 5000

objects.name: AS_GCM_DOC_CLAUSE_SELECTION_EMPTY_STATE
objects.description: Constant reference to the AS.GCM.ClauseSelectionEmptyState document

objects.name: AS_GCM_DOC_CLAUSE_USAGE_REPORT_DOWNLOAD_STATE
objects.description: Constant reference to the AS.GCM.ClauseUsageReportDownloadState

objects.name: AS_GCM_DOC_CLAUSE_USAGE_REPORT_PREVIEW_EMPTY_STATE
objects.description: Constant reference to the AS.GCM.ClauseUsageReportEmptyState document

objects.name: AS_GCM_INT_CHAR_LIMIT_CLAUSE_USAGE_REPORT_NAME
objects.description: Limit: 50

objects.name: AS_GCM_INT_CLAUSE_TITLE_CUSTOM_TRUNCATION_LIMIT
objects.description: Value: 50

objects.name: AS_GCM_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS
objects.description: Special characters list for validations

objects.name: AS_GCM_TEXT_HYPHEN
objects.description: Value: "-"

objects.name: AS_GCM_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED
objects.description: Always leave this constant as false, only set to true for automated testing

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse
objects.description: Default a null value to false, otherwise returns the boolean value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue
objects.description: Default a null value to true, otherwise returns the boolean value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage
objects.description: Returns default required message (used for all editable fields) if required message is not passed.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition
objects.description: Returns the standard labelPosition based on the context of the component, allows for custom input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank
objects.description: A not() wrapped around AS_CO_UT_isBlank

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_left
objects.description: Executes the `left()` function with error handling for a null input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord
objects.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
objects.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
objects.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

objects.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
objects.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

objects.name: AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
objects.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

objects.name: AS_GCM_CP_recordActionItem
objects.description: contains the record action item component

objects.name: AS_GCM_ClauseUsageReport_ColumnConfig
objects.description: Column Configuration rule for clause usage filter

objects.name: AS_GCM_DSP_clauseRecordTitle
objects.description: Displays the clause record title

objects.name: AS_GCM_QR_GetClauseUsageReportClauses
objects.description: Returns clause mapping details

objects.name: AS_GCM_VD_validationForSpecialCharacters
objects.description: Validation for special characters

objects.name: AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName
objects.description: The rule returns the hex code when a color name is passed

objects.name: AS_GCM_returnHyphenOnNullValue
objects.description: Rule to return Hyphen(-) if the given input is null

objects.name: AS_GCM_returnValueBasedOnAutomationToggle
objects.description: Returns the given value if Automation toggle is true.

objects.name: AS_CO_CP_checkBoxField
objects.description:
Generic checkbox field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

objects.name: AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField
objects.description: Standard readOnly field, utilizes a!textField(), use a!richTextDisplayField() for further formatting

objects.description: Interface to display Clauses section in Clause Usage report configuration

objects.description: Interface to display Details section in Clause Usage report configuration

objects.name: AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField
objects.description: Contains the a!recordActionField() component

objects.name: AS_GCM_CRD_ClauseUsageReport_CollapsibleSection
objects.description: Contains a collapsible section implemented using cardLayout

objects.description: Interface to display configuration pane contents of clause usage report generation

objects.description: Displays Data Preview grid in Clause Usage Report
